issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
The default app icons and splashes for Windows for an Alloy project are:
https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/tree/master/platforms/windows/project/app/assets/windows

There's an icon and splash missing if you compare this with the defaults in the Windows SDK:
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_windows/tree/master/templates/build/Assets

And of course the Alloy defaults should show the Alloy logo, not a white square with a cross:
https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/blob/master/platforms/windows/project/app/assets/windows/Logo.png
fields.summary: Windows: Default project's windows icons and splashes are incomplete and lack logo
